item.title: Dustin add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "We are all subject to the fates. But we must all act as if we are not, or die of despair...death will sweep through all the worlds; it will be the triumph of despair, forever. The universes will all become nothing more than interlocking machines, blind and empty of thought, feeling, life..." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Dustin add a quote by William Gibson
item.description:

<i>The Economist, December 4, 2003</i>" -- William Gibson

item.title: Dustin add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The Lord is my shepherd. I shall not want for nothing. He makes me lie down in the green pastures. He greases up my head with oil. He gives me kung-fu in the face of my enemies. Amen" -- Stephen King
